rows.label: qst202012_msg001
rows.name:
I need you to find a pair of
golden bracers I hid away
nigh on 30 years ago.

rows.label: qst202012_msg002
rows.name:
As my memory serves, we buried
them in the Fief of Forgetfulness
in Superbia...

rows.label: qst202012_msg003
rows.name:
But Musubi insists that it was at the
Ruins of Fountain Park in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202012_msg004
rows.name:
If you could check both of those
locations just to make sure, it'd
be fantastic.

rows.label: qst202012_msg101
rows.name:
I'm thinking of sending those bracers
to my son and daughter.

rows.label: qst202012_msg102
rows.name:
My son's name is Artus. He should be
in Alba Margen in Superbia.

rows.label: qst202012_msg103
rows.name:
And my daughter's called Noelia.
She's living in Fons Maim, in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202012_msg104
rows.name:
I trust you to get the bracers to them.
And of course, I'll be sure to reward
you handsomely when you're done!
